info.title: TON Index
info.description: TON Index collects data from a full node to PostgreSQL database and provides convenient API to an indexed blockchain.

get.description: Returns first and last blocks information, can be used as a start point for blockchain search process

parameters.name: workchain

schema.description: Block workchain.
schema.title: Workchain

parameters.description: Block workchain.

parameters.name: shard

schema.description: Block shard id. Must be sent with *workchain*. Example: `8000000000000000`
schema.title: Shard

parameters.description: Block shard id. Must be sent with *workchain*. Example: `8000000000000000`

parameters.name: seqno

schema.description: Block seqno. Must be sent with *workchain* and *shard*.
schema.title: Seqno

parameters.description: Block seqno. Must be sent with *workchain* and *shard*.

parameters.name: start_utime

schema.description: Query blocks with generation UTC timestamp **after** given timestamp.
schema.title: Start Utime

parameters.description: Query blocks with generation UTC timestamp **after** given timestamp.

parameters.name: end_utime

schema.description: Query blocks with generation UTC timestamp **before** given timestamp
schema.title: End Utime

parameters.description: Query blocks with generation UTC timestamp **before** given timestamp

parameters.name: start_lt

schema.description: Query blocks with `lt >= start_lt`
schema.title: Start Lt

parameters.description: Query blocks with `lt >= start_lt`

parameters.name: end_lt

schema.description: Query blocks with `lt <= end_lt`
schema.title: End Lt

parameters.description: Query blocks with `lt <= end_lt`

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.

parameters.name: sort

schema.description: Sort results by UTC timestamp.
schema.title: Sort

parameters.description: Sort results by UTC timestamp.

get.description: Generates and returns a user-friendly address book for a given contract address list.

schema.title: Address

parameters.description: List of addresses in any form. Max list size: 1024

get.description:
Returns all workchain blocks, that appeared after previous masterchain block.

**Note:** this method is not equivalent with [/api/v2/shards](https://toncenter.com/api/v2/#/blocks/get_shards_shards_get).

get.description:
Returns transactions whose inbound/outbound message has the specified hash. This endpoint returns list of Transaction objects
since collisions of message hashes can occur.

post.description:
Send external message in boc base64 format to TON network. Returns message hash in hex format.

External messages are sent from the outside to the smart contracts to make them perform certain actions.
For instance, a wallet smart contract expects to receive external messages signed by the wallet's owner.

schema.title: Message
schema.description: Message in boc base64 format.

schema.title: Run Get Method Request
schema.description: RunGetMethod request body

post.description:
Estimate fees required for query processing.

Body, init_code and init_data accepted in base64 encoded format.

schema.title: Run Get Method Request
schema.description: EstimateFee request body

parameters.name: address

schema.description: Account address. Can be sent in raw or user-friendly form.
schema.title: Address

parameters.description: Account address. Can be sent in raw or user-friendly form.

get.description:
Get wallet smart contract information. The following wallets are supported: `v1r1`, `v1r2`, `v1r3`, `v2r1`, `v2r2`, `v3r1`, `v3r2`, `v4r1`, `v4r2`.
In case the account is not a wallet error code 409 is returned.

parameters.name: address

schema.description: Smart contract address. Can be sent in raw or user-friendly form.
schema.title: Address

parameters.description: Smart contract address. Can be sent in raw or user-friendly form.

ExternalMessage.title: ExternalMessage
ExternalMessage.description: Message in base64 boc serialized format.

error.title: Error
error.default: Block not found in DB: workchain: -1, shard: -9223372036854775808, seqno: latest

message_hash.title: Message Hash
message_hash.description: Hash of sent message in hex format
